name: Monster Route
description:
You are tasked with a emergency express shipment to the city. The problem? It's going through State Route 20, Known to truckers as the Monster Route.

Made this game for my Digital Narratives class at UCF. They said i could put it on here now that i'm done.

This is the first thing i have ever written fiction wise. This is also technically the first game i ever completed. All background art is also done by me.

I know there's a few grammar issues that are weird but yeh hope its good.

Follow me on twitter if you want:

https://twitter.com/AmiTheRobot
